nodes.text: Misurno was a male member of the Galactic Empire who had served as the copilot and teacher of Bodhi Rook on the Fentersohn run. Misurno had once shot rebels, pirates and Separatist holdouts in a starfighter and passed on these stories to Rook. At one point, when drunk, Misurno called Rook his best—and only—friend.
